ivr.title: IV Rank / Percentile (1y lookback)
ivr.description: Corridors for IVR to guide short/long vol posture.

low.guidance: Avoid naked shorts (vol cheap, poor RR).

high.guidance: Avoid adding shorts; hedge—elevated panic risk.

atm_iv.title: ATM Implied Volatility (absolute)
atm_iv.description: Absolute ATM IV level for the underlying (majors vs equities differ).

cheap.label: <20% (crypto) / <15% (equities)
cheap.guidance: Cheap vol; prefer defined-risk spreads/calendars over naked shorts.

normal.guidance: Normal regime; condors/strangles attractive with prudent widths.

stress.guidance: Stress regime; consider exiting/reducing short premium and add hedges.

term_structure_spread.title: Term Structure (Back − Front IV, vol pts)
term_structure_spread.description: Positive = contango (front < back). Negative = backwardation (front > back).

backwardation.label: < −2 vol pts
backwardation.guidance: Backwardation: crash/stress conditions—avoid short vol or hedge actively.

flat.label: ≈ −2 to +1
flat.guidance: Flat: neutral carry environment; size conservatively.

contango.label: ≥ +1 vol pt
contango.guidance: Contango: safer carry environment; short-vol structures favored.

skew_rr25.title: Skew (25Δ Risk Reversal, Call − Put, vol pts)
skew_rr25.description: Sign and magnitude of RR guide wing selection and overwrites.

puts_rich.guidance: Puts rich: overweight put wings; avoid excessive downside short gamma.

calls_rich.guidance: Calls rich: favor call overwrites or upside-biased spreads.

vol_of_vol.title: Vol-of-Vol (e.g., VVIX/MOVE proxy)
vol_of_vol.description: Higher levels imply faster IV changes and larger tail risk.

stressed.guidance: Stressed regime; reduce size and consider hedges.

iv_rv_spread.title: IV − RV Spread (vol pts)
iv_rv_spread.description: Positive values indicate implied > realized; potential carry edge.

no_edge.guidance: No edge: avoid adding short premium; consider long-vol structures.

weak_edge.label: 0 to +5
weak_edge.guidance: Weak edge: neutral/light carry; wait for better pricing.

carry_edge.label: +5 to +15
carry_edge.guidance: Carry edge present: short premium acceptable with risk controls.

rich_vol.guidance: Rich vol: strong shorting opportunity (mind RV trend and events).

em_hit_rate_90d.title: Hit Rate of Expected Move (90d rolling)
em_hit_rate_90d.description: Share of sessions staying within the daily expected move.

overpriced_long_edge.guidance: EM overpriced: edge to long vol; avoid large short premium.

balanced.guidance: Balanced regime: carry acceptable with prudent risk.

sell_premium.guidance: EM overpriced: favorable for selling premium.

rv_em_ratio.title: RV ÷ EM (ratio)
rv_em_ratio.description: Compares realized volatility to expected move.

em_overpriced.guidance: EM overpriced → short vol edge; prefer defined-risk shorts.

neutral.guidance: Neutral: maintain standard sizing or diversify structures.

em_underpriced.guidance: EM underpriced: riskier to sell premium; consider long gamma.

stressed.guidance: Stressed: avoid heavy short gamma; tighten risk.

vvix.title: VVIX (level)
vvix.description: Vol-of-vol for the S&P 500 options surface.

stress.guidance: Stress: reduce exposure; hedge tail risk.

funding_rate_annualized.title: Funding Rate (perps, annualized)
funding_rate_annualized.description: Crowding proxy in perpetual futures; extremes imply squeeze/bounce risk.

crowded_shorts.guidance: Crowded shorts: bounce risk—consider contrarian bias or reduce shorts.

watch_longs.label: +5% to +10%
watch_longs.guidance: Long bias building; monitor for squeeze conditions.

crowded_longs.guidance: Crowded longs: squeeze risk—avoid chasing; consider hedges.

macro_event_tminus_days.title: Macro Event Window (days to event)
macro_event_tminus_days.description: Fed/CPI/NFP/ETF rulings—event premium affects carry and gap risk.

avoid_new_shorts.label: ≤1 day
avoid_new_shorts.guidance: Avoid initiating new shorts within T–1; carry unreliable.

caution_window.label: 2–3 days
caution_window.guidance: Caution: lighten size or use defined risk ahead of event.

normal.label: ≥3 days
normal.guidance: Normal operations; event risk still on the calendar.

caution.guidance: Caution: expect some slippage; tighten entry/exit rules.

avoid.guidance: Avoid scaling; liquidity thin and fills costly.

tob_depth_contracts.title: TOB Depth (contracts per strike)
tob_depth_contracts.description: Top-of-book contract depth indicates liquidity to absorb sizing.

oi_concentration_pct.title: Open Interest Concentration (single strike, % of OI)
oi_concentration_pct.description: High concentration increases pin/gamma risk into expiry.

pin_risk.guidance: High pin risk; manage gamma and rolls.

very_high.guidance: Very high concentration: strong pin risk—adjust positioning.

condor_credit_pct_of_em.title: Condor Credit (% of EM)
condor_credit_pct_of_em.description: Credit relative to expected move gauges risk/reward.

poor_rr.guidance: Poor RR: avoid deployment or widen wings cheaply.

ok.guidance: Borderline: only with other favorable signals.

very_rich.guidance: Very rich: excellent—validate with RV/EM and events.

maxloss_credit_ratio.title: Max Loss ÷ Credit (ratio)
maxloss_credit_ratio.description: Lower is better; reflects payoff asymmetry.

borderline.guidance: Borderline: reduce size or improve strikes.

pnl_vs_credit_pct.title: PnL vs Premium Collected (% of credit)
pnl_vs_credit_pct.description: Realized PnL relative to initial credit.

drawdown.label: −150% to 0%
drawdown.guidance: Drawdown: manage risk; consider adjustments or exit.

in_progress.guidance: In progress: consider partials or manage at targets.

target_reached.guidance: Target reached: close early to lock gains.

delta_exposure_pct_nav.title: Delta Exposure (% of NAV equivalent)
delta_exposure_pct_nav.description: Absolute delta exposure vs NAV proxy.

gamma_theta_ratio.title: Gamma Risk ÷ Daily Theta (ratio)
gamma_theta_ratio.description: Gamma risk relative to daily carry.

safe.guidance: Safe: gamma risk within daily theta.

elevated.guidance: Elevated: monitor intraday; reduce if volatility rises.

high.guidance: High: adjust or hedge; risk exceeds daily carry.

friction.guidance: Friction: tighten price bands or use smart-order logic.

arrival_slippage_ticks.title: Arrival Slippage (ticks per leg)
arrival_slippage_ticks.description: Price impact vs arrival for each leg.

breakage_rate_pct.title: Breakage Rate (% of multi-leg orders)
breakage_rate_pct.description: Share of complex orders that fail to complete as a package.

capital_utilization_pct_nav.title: Capital Utilization (% of NAV)
capital_utilization_pct_nav.description: Total capital at risk across structures.

very_high.guidance: Very high: reduce risk; preserve optionality.

edge_realized_pct.title: Locked vs Realized Edge Capture (%)
edge_realized_pct.description: How much of the theoretical edge you actually keep.

low.guidance: Low: execution slippage too high—review process.

box_financing_spread_bps.title: Implied Financing − Funding Costs (bps, annualized)
box_financing_spread_bps.description: Net spread after funding vs implied; higher is better.

no_trade.label: <0 bps
no_trade.guidance: No trade: spread negative after costs.

min_edge.label: 0–5 bps
min_edge.guidance: Minimum edge: may not cover slippage.

ok_edge.label: 5–20 bps
ok_edge.guidance: Acceptable: consider trade if liquidity supports.

slippage_budget_ticks_4legs.title: Slippage Budget (ticks across 4 legs)
slippage_budget_ticks_4legs.description: Total tolerable slippage for a box/complex before edge erodes.

edge_erased.label: >5 ticks
edge_erased.guidance: Edge likely erased: abort or re-route.

basis_spread_annualized_pct.title: Spot–Perp / Futures Basis (annualized %)
basis_spread_annualized_pct.description: Annualized basis between spot and perp/futures.

negative.guidance: Negative basis: unwind risk or long-basis opportunity with caution.

good.guidance: Good carry: deploy with standard risk checks.

term_structure_kink_abs.title: Term Structure Kink (abs, vol pts)
term_structure_kink_abs.description: Local curvature vs smooth fit; large kinks often coincide with stress/regime change.

flat.guidance: Flat: smooth term structure; signals align with carry.

curved.guidance: Curved: caution; prefer defined-risk or smaller sizing.

kinked.guidance: Kinked: potential stress; avoid aggressive short vol.
